qas.question: What did von Neumann work on in 1937 - 39?
What properties determine dimension in lattice theory?

answers.text: conserved by perspective mappings ("perspectivities") and ordered by inclusion

qas.question: Who wrote that "John von Neumann's brilliant mind blazed over lattice theory like a meteor?"

context: Von Neumann worked on <a0_0>lattice theory<a0_0/> between 1937 and 1939. Von Neumann provided an abstract exploration of dimension in completed complemented modular topological lattices: "Dimension is determined, up to a positive linear transformation, by the following two properties. It is <a1_0>conserved by perspective mappings ("perspectivities") and ordered by inclusion<a1_0/>. The deepest part of the proof concerns the equivalence of perspectivity with "projectivity by decomposition"—of which a corollary is the transitivity of perspectivity." <a2_0>Garrett Birkhoff<a2_0/> writes: "John von Neumann's brilliant mind blazed over lattice theory like a meteor".
